statements: UPDATE risk_metrics SET risk_value = 0.75 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE risk_metrics SET timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE risk_metrics SET risk_value = 0.5, risk_type = 'low' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE risk_metrics SET risk_value = 0.75 WHERE risk_type = 'credit' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE risk_metrics SET risk_value = 0.85 WHERE risk_type = 'operational';
UPDATE risk_metrics SET risk_value = 0.9, timestamp = NOW() WHERE risk_type = 'market' AND id = 5;
UPDATE risk_metrics SET metric_value = 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE trading_operations SET trade_amount = 5000 WHERE operation_id = 100;
UPDATE risk_metrics SET timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE risk_metrics SET metric_value = 15.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE trading_operations SET trade_amount = 5000.00, risk_score = 8 WHERE operation_id = 100;
UPDATE risk_metrics SET metric_value = metric_value * 1.1 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE RiskMetrics SET value = 10.5 WHERE metric_name = 'liquidity_ratio';
UPDATE TradeOperations SET trade_amount = 5000 WHERE trade_id = 123;
UPDATE Exposure SET exposure_value = 2000 WHERE operation_id = 456 AND risk_metric_id = 789;
UPDATE RiskMetrics SET value = value * 1.1 WHERE metric_name = 'VaR';
UPDATE TradeOperations SET trade_amount = trade_amount * 0.95 WHERE timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
UPDATE Exposure SET exposure_value = exposure_value * 1.05 WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
UPDATE risk_metrics SET metric_value = 10 WHERE metric_name = 'liquidity'
UPDATE trading_operations SET operation_amount = 5000 WHERE operation_type = 'buy'
UPDATE exposure_assessment SET assessment_rating = 'high' WHERE assessed_by = 'John Doe'
UPDATE risk_metrics SET metric_value = 100.5 WHERE metric_name = 'liquidity';
UPDATE trading_operations SET operation_amount = operation_amount * 1.1 WHERE operation_type = 'buy';
UPDATE exposure_assessment SET assessment_rating = 'High Risk' WHERE assessment_date = '2023-01-10';
UPDATE RiskMetrics SET metric_value = 25.5 WHERE metric_id = 1;
UPDATE TradeExposure SET exposure_amount = 5000.75 WHERE exposure_id = 3;
UPDATE RiskFactors SET factor_name = 'Market Risk' WHERE factor_id = 2;
UPDATE RiskMetrics SET metric_name = 'New Name', metric_description = 'Updated Description' WHERE metric_id = 1;
UPDATE TradeExposure SET exposure_amount = 15000, currency = 'USD' WHERE exposure_id = 100;
UPDATE RiskFactors SET factor_description = 'Revised factor description' WHERE factor_id = 3;
